taskDescription: The byte-pair encoding (BPE) algorithm obtains the sub-word vocabulary to be used by the neural network by starting with a vocabulary made of all the letter-sized units in a corpus. These units are then incrementally extended by performing a number of merge steps as specified by an integer that represents the number of merge operations. A merge step implies choosing the most frequent pair (ties broken randomly) of sub-word units in a corpus and joining them in a new sub-word unit. What will be the vocabulary of sub-word units resulting from applying the BPE algorithm to the sentence "the cat is on the chat" with 3 merge operations? By using the resulting vocabulary, how will the sentence "the cats are meowing" be divided into sub-words? Justify your answer.
